title: Climbing center
guiaDeMontanaTitle1: It comes as far as you propose ...
guiaDeMontana1: We have a technical team of professional climbing guide with regulated training to practice as mountain companions in Canarias and throughout the national level.
guiaDeMontana2: We organize cataloged activities of active tourism along with our mountain guide services.
guiaDeMontana3: Contact us and enjoy a different experience in full nature, accompanied by professionals and with the highest safety coverage.
